title: When are theft planning to add baby/ toddler swings to Wade Park?  It needs them for younger children.  Also the vegetation has taken over and needs to be trimmed. It is too dangerous to walk around the loop due to the tall undergrowth.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/09/when-will-they-add-babytoddler-swings-to-wade-park-also-the-vegetation-has-taken-over-and-needs-to-be-trimmed/
